channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8311306] Test com/sun/management/ThreadMXBean/ThreadCpuTimeArray.java failed: out of expected range
item.description:
---------System.err:(10/605)----------
java.lang.RuntimeException: TEST FAILED: MyThread-1 CPU time = 16805360 previous CPU time 16628040 out of expected range
at ThreadCpuTimeArray.main(ThreadCpuTimeArray.java:144)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DirectMethodHandleAccessor.invoke(DirectMethodHandleAccessor.java:103)
at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:580)
at com.sun.javatest.regtest.agent.MainActionHelper$AgentVMRunnable.run(MainActionHelper.java:333)
at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1583)

The "expected range" is within a DELTA of 100.

But the other odd thing about this failure is that the main thread is being continually interrupted somehow:

Unexpected exception is thrown.
java.lang.InterruptedException
at java.base/java.lang.Object.wait0(Native Method)
at java.base/java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:366)
at java.base/java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:339)
at ThreadCpuTimeArray$MyThread.run(ThreadCpuTimeArray.java:247)

repeated for each join() in the loop!
item.summary: Test com/sun/management/ThreadMXBean/ThreadCpuTimeArray.java failed: out of expected range

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/3192
Date: 2025-01-08 14:11:06 +0000

Fix request [17u]

I backport this for parity with 17.0.15-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Trivial resolve.
Test passes. SAP nighlty testing passed.

jdk21u-dev backport request
I would like to have the patch in jdk21u-dev as well, because the issue is present there too. The backport is clean and low risk.

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/933
Date: 2024-08-19 07:13:55 +0000
Issue has reappeared for us too - JDK-8335124

those errors are still showing up on the ppc64(le) platforms from time to time (AIX/Linux).
Example :
java.lang.RuntimeException: TEST FAILED: MyThread-2 CPU time = 18496110 previous CPU time 18222580 out of expected range
at ThreadCpuTimeArray.main(ThreadCpuTimeArray.java:145)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DirectMethodHandleAccessor.invoke(DirectMethodHandleAccessor.java:103)
at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:580)
at com.sun.javatest.regtest.agent.MainActionHelper$AgentVMRunnable.run(MainActionHelper.java:333)
at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1583)

JavaTest Message: Test threw exception: java.lang.RuntimeException
JavaTest Message: shutting down test

Changeset: e1fd663f
Author: Kevin Walls <kevinw@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-12-12 09:58:41 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/e1fd663f224909c09f2f6fab7ad20f7b7864b62b

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/17054
Date: 2023-12-11 11:33:08 +0000

Should run main/othervm. It's not clear where the interruptions come from, but most other tests here use othervm.

An InterruptedException in MyThread::run's wait causes a break, which might mean leaving the while loop early and returning before done is true.
It needs to wait for the lock to be acquired and waited on until done is set true.
It could retry the wait (if !done) and not fail due to an InterruptedException.
(even if these runs had not failed on the time difference, they would flag the interruption as a failure)

In the same directory the test
"test/jdk/com/sun/management/ThreadMXBean/ThreadAllocatedMemoryArray.java"
..is othervm, and would be similarly sensitive to Interruptions, which would make it fail. But that test is not seen to fail, so it seems like othervm might be all we need.

Also although I can't say it happened, we could race with some other test calling mbean.setThreadCpuTimeEnabled(boolean);

Here's the log from my jdk-22+25 stress run sighting on macos-aarch64:

$ unzip -l jdk-22+25_macosx-aarch64.8311306.zip
Archive: jdk-22+25_macosx-aarch64.8311306.zip
  Length Date Time Name
--------- ---------- ----- ----
    20574 11-24-2023 02:47 jdk-22+25_2/failures.macosx-aarch64/ThreadCpuTimeArray.jtr.slowdebug
--------- -------
    20574 1 file

Lastest failures on Windows is showing some extreme behaviour:

java.lang.RuntimeException: TEST FAILED: MyThread-7 CPU time = 15625000 previous CPU time 0 out of expected range
at ThreadCpuTimeArray.main(ThreadCpuTimeArray.java:144)


The log shows lots of zero cases:

yThread-0 Previous Cpu Time = 0 Current CPU time = 0
MyThread-0 Previous User Time = 0 Current User time = 0
MyThread-1 Previous Cpu Time = 0 Current CPU time = 0
MyThread-1 Previous User Time = 0 Current User time = 0
MyThread-2 Previous Cpu Time = 0 Current CPU time = 0
MyThread-2 Previous User Time = 0 Current User time = 0
MyThread-3 Previous Cpu Time = 31250000 Current CPU time = 31250000
MyThread-3 Previous User Time = 31250000 Current User time = 31250000
MyThread-4 Previous Cpu Time = 0 Current CPU time = 0
MyThread-4 Previous User Time = 0 Current User time = 0
MyThread-5 Previous Cpu Time = 0 Current CPU time = 0
MyThread-5 Previous User Time = 0 Current User time = 0
MyThread-6 Previous Cpu Time = 0 Current CPU time = 0
MyThread-6 Previous User Time = 0 Current User time = 0
